gameplay.title: Gameplay Gallery
gameplay.subtitle: Run a cafe by day, explore dreams by night!

videos.desc1: HIPS N NOSES is a unique game that combines management simulation with action roguelike elements. At night, enter the dream world to defeat monsters and collect rare ingredients, and during the day, run a cafe that helps customers regain their lost memories in the real world.
videos.desc2: Each customer who visits the cafe has unique tastes and preferences. You can adjust and enhance recipes with the best ingredients through hints in conversations. Satisfying even the most demanding customers will bring greater rewards and profits.
videos.desc3: The ever-changing dream world offers a new experience with every exploration. Various people you meet in reality also appear in the dream world, and together you can defeat numerous monsters and collect special ingredients that cannot be obtained in reality.
videos.desc4: You can decorate your cafe with various kitchen tools, interact with diverse customers, and become stronger by defeating dream monsters. Through this growth system, you can efficiently serve more customers, adding depth and long-term fun to the game.
